ILBMaterialHandle Struct Reference

This reference page is linked to from the following overview topics: Creating Classic Materials, Creating a Scene, Creating Physical Materials.

Search for all occurrences

#include <beastapitypes.h>

Class Description

Handle for Beast materials
Intentionally hidden implementation.

Examples:

examples-physical/code/common/samplescommon.h, examples/code/atlas/atlas.cpp, examples/code/baking/baking.cpp, examples/code/cache/cache.cpp, examples/code/ernst/ernst.cpp, examples/code/lightsources/lightsources.cpp, examples/code/liveernst/liveernst.cpp, examples/code/lua/lua.cpp, examples/code/materials/materials.cpp, examples/code/occlusion/occlusion.cpp, examples/code/pointcloud/pointcloud.cpp, examples/code/readback/readback.cpp, examples/code/renderstats/renderstats.cpp, examples/code/rnm/rnm.cpp, examples/code/shbaking/shbaking.cpp, examples/code/simple/simple.cpp, examples/code/uvset/uvset.cpp, include/beastapi/beastapitypes.h, include/beastapi/beastinstance.h, include/beastapi/beastmaterial.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/include/beastwrappers/beastmaterialwrapper.h, maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastinstancewrapper.cpp, and maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beastscenewrapper.cpp.
